_Type_
=== Declaration ===
<pre>
#include <pgm/pgm.h>

typedef struct pgm_gsi_t *pgm_gsi_t*;

struct pgm_gsi_t {
	char identifier`[`6`]`;
};
</pre>

=== Purpose ===
A globally unique source identifier (GSI).
